nushi_iwa_030_friend_01:
All right! Look at my little buddy, coming through
like a champ![npcn:6]
nushi_iwa_030_friend_02:
But these Titan Pokémon are...yeesh. I sure don’t
like having something so tough out to get me![npcn:6]
nushi_iwa_030_friend_05:
I bet somewhere in here there’s more of that
Herba Mystica the Titan was eating.[npcn:6]
nushi_iwa_030_friend_06:
Quick, let’s have a look around before it
comes back![npcn:6]
